attributes.action: Change A-Level and GCSE grades to not be awarded by ranking student ability
attributes.additional_details: Comparing student ability is unfair practice as it depends on the class and school. Ranking students involves a teacher bias, meaning that instead of student ability being based on personal attainment, it’s subject to the teacher’s belief- even if it is based on previous data.
attributes.background: To have A-levels and GCSEs to be graded through personal attainment, rather than comparing student’s grades within the class. This is more fair, as the student’s personal effort is considered instead

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306773.
